name: AI Helper
description:
- Click Bots and Players to toggle activation! -

- Bots will move, change direction and auto-double jump automatically!  -

- You have only the control of Players! -

- Main Goal: All Players and Bots must be touching the Flag! -

- Collect All Gems of each Level!  -

- Beware of obstacles! -

- Don't fall off nor touch Spikes! -

CONTROLS:

  • Activate/Deactivate Player/Bot: Left-Click Mouse on specific Entity.
  • Move Player Left/Right: ( ←  and  →  ) OR  ( 'A'  and  'D' )
  • (Double-)Jump: 'Spacebar'
  • Pause: 'P', 'Escape' or 'Backspace'
  • Restart: 'R'

PATCH NOTES:

  • Version 0.0.0.1 (Aug 14th 2022):
    • Released game to the public as beta testing
  • Version 1.0.0.0 (Aug 15th 2022):
    • Released game to the public for submission to Wowie Jam 4.0
  • Version 1.0.0.1 (Aug 15th 2022):
    • Added more Levels
    • Readjusted Level Order to go Easy Difficulty to Hard
    • Added FullScreen Options
  • Version 1.0.0.2 (Aug 15th 2022):
    • Fixed Credits room
    • Fixed a missing button menu at Level 8

KNOWN BUGS:

  • If you find a problem or a bug, please leave a comment!
